      • muged_1D_correlation

        double[] muged_1D_correlation(double[] fsignal,
                            double[] ssignal)
        Parameters:
        fsignal - - first 1D signal
        ssignal - - second 1D signal
        Returns:
        correlation - result

      • muged_2D_correlation

        double[][] muged_2D_correlation(double[][] fsignal,
                              double[][] ssignal,
                              int min_lag,
                              int max_lag)
        Calculates 2D correlation of signals in ranges: -max_lag : -min_lag and min_lag : max_lag
        Parameters:
        fsignal - - first 2D signal
        ssignal - - second 2D signal
        min_lag - - minimum range
        max_lag - - maximum range
        correlation - - result (memory will be allocated)

      • muged_1D_fft

        MugedComplex[] muged_1D_fft(double[] signal)
        Calculates 1D Fast Fourier Transform. If signal length is not power of two, signal is padded with zeros to the next power of two.
        Parameters:
        signal - - 1D signal
        Returns:
        spectrum - result

      • muged_2D_fft

        MugedComplex[][] muged_2D_fft(double[][] signal)
        Parameters:
        signal - - 1D signal
        spectrum - - result (memory will be allocated)
